com.pedroalmir.athena.core.problem
Class AbstractProblem

java.lang.Object
  com.pedroalmir.athena.core.problem.AbstractProblem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Problem, java.lang.Cloneable
public abstract class AbstractProblem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Problem

This is a convenience class that keeps track of the number of fitness evaluations. This class can be extended instead of implementing Problem directly.

The contract of returning an instance of InferiorFitness for solutions outside the problem search space is implemented by getFitness(Type).

getFitness

public final Fitness getFitness(Type solution)
Returns the fitness of a potential solution to this problem. The solution object is described by the domain of this problem, see #getDomain(). An instance of InferiorFitness should be returned if the solution falls outside the search space of this problem.

Specified by:
getFitness in interface Problem
Parameters:
solution - the potential solution found by the optimization algorithm.
Returns:
the fitness of the solution.
